TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Forum as mobile app????

Articles.Content: I think it would be a useful app so we can check things on the go.
There is already a mobile version that it automatically goes to when on a mobile device on the internet? As for an app, it would require internet anyways so i don't see what the difference would be.

This stuff goes in the Forum Forum.

Sit tight, I'll move it for you.
I would use it all the time, and every day. I'm too lazy to log in on mobile, so I never post on my phone!

Heh, I'm on my phone right now. Really, the mobile version is quite ugly and the normal one is kinda hard to use on a small screen. For example, the "new posts" and the "tumblr" buttons overlap. It would be really nice for us that don't sit next to our computers all day.

The thing is that, with vBulletin, this isn't as easy as it may seem. There are a couple plugins that can be used in conjunction with mobile apps to do this, but they're also security leaks and horribly inefficient. There's a nice rant about the tapatalk plugin somewhere, for instance.

The best we'll probably be able to do is adapt the mobile site to make it more useable, but the options for that are fairly limited.

I'd recommend getting a mobile browser that supports userscripts/-styles and cooking something up for your desires.
